name: Monster Inside
description:
Monster Inside

You woke up in a place you don't know, all you know is you have to escape as fast as possible.

Monster Inside is a short 2D pixel-art horror game. You are trapped inside a house and you have to find 4 pieces of a key and one glue to get out. But the whole time you are looking for the key pieces (and glue) you are chased by a monster, and every time you collect a key piece (or a glue) he gets faster.

Main Features:
  • Short gameplay time
  • Cute pixel-art graphics
  • Only singleplayer
  • Little of a story
  • English and Czech language
  • More coming soon with future updates!
Controls: MovementActionMain MenuW A S DEEsc Tileset coming out soon for free!Updates coming soon!
